name: Duplicate Page Post – MCC
author: MyCodeCare

sections.description:
Pro Version

Elevate your WordPress site management with the Duplicate Page Post – MCC Plugin. This powerful tool lets you effortlessly duplicate posts, pages, and custom post types with just a click, streamlining your workflow and saving time. Perfect for WooCommerce store management, it allows you to duplicate product pages, including all details and settings, ensuring consistency across your site.

The plugin offers features to enhance organization and identification. You can add unique prefixes and suffixes to duplicated posts, pages, and custom post types, providing clear structure and easy recognition. Customize titles for better organization and improved SEO optimization.

By default, duplicated posts and pages are set to draft status, but the MCC Plugin allows you to change this default status to suit your workflow, giving you greater control over your content management process.

Advanced controls over content and layout. Effortlessly manage WooCommerce product pages, streamline product management, and speed up edits. Personalize settings and preferences to enhance the user experience. Maintain consistent naming conventions by automatically adding prefixes or suffixes to your post titles.

In summary, the Duplicate Page Post – MCC Plugin is an essential tool for any WordPress site, offering powerful features for efficient content management, improved organization, and enhanced SEO optimization.

Features:
1. Duplicate page, post
2. Duplicate custom post (Pro version)
3. WooCommerce (Pro version)
4. Allow post types (Pro version)
5. Set page/post status after duplicate (Pro version)
6. Change duplicate button text (Pro version)
7. Set prefix of duplicated page/post (Pro version)
8. Set Suffix of duplicated page/post (Pro version)
9. Bulk action (Coming soon)

Pro Version
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard of your website:

  1. Go to ‘Plugins > Add New’,
  2. Search for ‘Duplicate Page Post – MCC’ and install the plugin,
  3. Activate the plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org (Manual installation):

  1. Download ‘Duplicate Page Post – MCC’ from wordpress.org.
  2. Upload it to the directory of your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (FTP, sFTP, SCP, etc.).
  3. Install the plugin.
  4. Activate the from your Plugins page.
